features.description: We create lasting connections between organizations and their stakeholders, and help them create a unique digital identity through traditional and modern marketing strategies.
features.title: Mission Statement

features.description:
Founded in 2003, Business Link Media Group has been an industry leader in the publishing of B2B direct mail newspapers, magazines, specialty publications, and event programs, as well as marketing through social media and online platforms.

In 2020 Business Link added digital multi-media marketing services including Blockchain solutions, NFTs, Cryptos, Web3.0, DAOs (Decentralized Autonomous Organization), and Metaverse.

Our traditional and modern media platforms are designed to educate, inform, and connect your organization with the stakeholders that matter to you. Our multitude of resources and networks give your business the opportunity to promote locally achieve global exposure.

link.text: Read our May digital publication online

features.title: About Us

features.description:
With 19 years media and marketing experience, we have a professional marketing and management team with MBAs and entrepreneurs, and tracking record in building success for many businesses. Our core competitiveness:
1. In-depth market research
2. Deep connection to the local and international markets
3. Date-tracking and optimization
4. Creative and relatable content

contentSections.description: A space to learn some fundamental knowledge about NFTs, DAOs, Web 3, and Metaverse.
contentSections.label: To learn, explore, and practise
contentSections.smallTextWithLink: Welcome blockchain enthusiast far and wide! We’re an online and in-person tech-enthusiast group hosting live speaking events on a range of NFTs, Cryptos, Web3.0, DAO and Metaverse topics. We are hosting regular events to learn from each other, to share your stories and experience, to explore something new, and to practice with some NFTs or DAOs.
contentSections.title: Blockchain in Business Club

buttons.text: Click here to nominate candidates in Niagara

contentSections.label: 19th Annual in 2022
contentSections.smallTextWithLink:
Business Link Media Group first established its 40 Under Forty Business Achievement Awards back in 2003. One of Niagara’s most prestigious awards, this annual program recognizes 40 business people under the age of 40 who have demonstrated an extraordinary level of success in the private, public and non-profit sectors.

Business Link has hosted 18 years of Annual 40 Under Forty Business Achievement Awards. The primary purpose of our annual awards banquet is to give back to the Niagara region while identifying individuals and businesses that greatly contribute to the growth and development of our community. To date we have recognized the successes of 720 business leaders across the Niagara region. 

Turning challenges into opportunities, BLMG has overcome the restrictions imposed by the COVID-19 pandemic by holding the award ceremony as an online event. By doing so,not only we have not allowed the situation to hinder the celebration of our Niagara business talents, but we have also expanded the reach and availability of the awards ceremony to a potential audience of thousands more with a virtually ever-lasting time frame.
contentSections.title: 40 Under Forty Niagara

buttons.text: Click here to nominate candidates in Hamilton

contentSections.label: 9th Annual in 2022
contentSections.smallTextWithLink:
Business Link Media Group first established its 40 Under Forty Business Achievement Awards back in 2014, one of Hamilton’s most prestigious awards.

With its 40 Under Forty Business Achievement Awards program, Business Link Media Group takes great pride in promoting award-winners as role models to their fellow business professionals and to the community at large.

Each year, nominated individuals are given close consideration by a distinguished panel of local business leaders and past award recipients. This panel takes several criteria into account to determine the final 40 award recipients. These criteria include:

~ An uncommon level of accomplishment in their field or industry.

~ A demonstration of leadership and innovation with their business or workplace.

~ An ability to overcome obstacles and achieve results.

~ An active involvement in their industry and/or community.

~ A commitment to constant improvement.
contentSections.title: 40 Under Forty Hamilton
